infoList.text:
Became the winner of the 7th Takasaki International Art and Music Competition. 

 Entered The Belarusian State Academy of Art.
Began working at State Institute of Management and Social Technologies. Graduated from Belarusian State Academy of Art.
Entered Graphics Department of Artistic Academic Association of Fineart, Graphics, Sculpture under the guidance of artist Georgiy Poplavskiy.
Became a member of the Belarusian Artists Union.
Holds the position of Senior Lecturer at the BSU, leads the drawing and painting courses.
Vsevolod Shvayba participated with his paintings and graphics in many collective exhibitions.
